TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OracleConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OracleConnectionStringBuilder Inherits DbConnectionStringBuilder

summary.span: 提供簡單的方法，以建立和管理 類別使用之連接字串的內容。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型已被取代，並將.NET Framework 的未來版本中移除。This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md). 連接字串產生器可讓開發人員以程式設計方式建立語法正確的連接字串，以及剖析和重建現有的連接字串，使用屬性和類別的方法。The connection string builders allow developers to programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and to parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class. 連接字串產生器提供強型別的屬性對應到 Oracle 所允許的已知索引鍵/值組。The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by Oracle. 類別會實作 介面。The class implements the interface. 這表示，此類別適用於 Visual Studio.NET 設計工具在設計階段。This means that the class works with Visual Studio .NET designers at design time. 當開發人員會使用設計工具來建置強型別**資料集**和強型別在 Visual Studio.NET，強型別的連接字串產生器類別中的連線會顯示它的型別相關聯的屬性並也會有對應至已知索引鍵的常見值的轉換器。When developers use the designer to build strongly typed **DataSets** and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio .NET, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys. 必須建立連接字串做為應用程式一部分的開發人員可以使用 類別來建置及修改連接字串。Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the class to build and modify connection strings. 類別也可以輕鬆管理儲存在應用程式組態檔中的連接字串。The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file. 會執行有效索引鍵/值組的檢查。The performs checks for valid key/value pairs. 因此，此類別不能用於建立無效的連接字串。Therefore, this class cannot be used to create invalid connection strings. 嘗試加入無效組會擲回例外狀況。Trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception. 類別會維護固定的同義資料表，集合，並在必要時可以執行必要的轉換，將從同義資料表轉換成相對應的已知索引鍵名稱。The class maintains a fixed collection of synonyms, and when required, can perform the required translation to convert from a synonym to the corresponding well-known key name. 例如，當您使用屬性擷取值，您可以指定字串，包含您所需要的索引鍵的任何同義。For example, when you use the property to retrieve a value, you can specify a string that contains any synonym for the key you need. 如需可接受的完整同義資料表清單，請參閱 屬性。See the property for a full list of acceptable synonyms. 處理嘗試插入惡意的項目。The handles attempts to insert malicious entries. 例如，下列程式碼，使用預設屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 正確逸出巢狀索引鍵/值組。For example, the following code, using the default property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair. ```vb Dim builder As New System.Data. _ OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "OracleDemo" builder("Integrated Security") = True builder("User ID") = "Mary;NewValue=Bad" System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` ```csharp System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "OracleDemo"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["User ID"] = "Mary;NewValue=Bad"; System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` 結果是以安全的方式處理無效的值，藉由以引號括住的使用者識別碼值的下列連接字串：The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner by enclosing the User ID value in quotes: ``` Data Source=OracleDemo;Integrated Security=True;User ID="Mary;NewValue=Bad" ``` ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式建置 Oracle 資料庫的連接字串。The following console application builds connection strings for an Oracle database. 程式碼會使用類別來建立連接字串，並傳遞屬性connection 類別的執行個體建構函式。The code uses an class to create the connection string, and then passes the property of the instance to the constructor of the connection class. 此範例也會剖析現有的連接字串，並示範操作連接字串內容的各種方式。The example also parses an existing connection string, and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the connection string's contents. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.span: 物件內部連接資訊的基準。

span.span: The basis for the object's internal connection information.
Parsed into name/value pairs.

param.span: 無效索引鍵名稱會引發 。

span.span: Invalid key names raise a .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 所提供的連接字串會提供執行個體內部連接資訊的資料。

span.span: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供索引鍵/值組的固定內部集合。The class provides a fixed internal collection of key/value pairs. 即使您只在建構函式中提供可能連接字串值的少量子集，此物件一定會針對每一個索引鍵/值組提供預設值。Even if you supply only a small subset of the possible connection string values in the constructor, the object always provides default values for each key/value pair. 當已擷取之物件的屬性，則字串會包含只所在項目的預設值不同的值是索引鍵/值組。When the property of the object is retrieved, the string contains only key/value pairs in which the value is different from the default value for the item. ## Examples 下列範例提供簡單的連接字串中物件的建構函式，然後逐一查看物件內的所有索引鍵/值組。The following example supplies a simple connection string in the object's constructor, and then iterates through all the key/value pairs within the object. 請注意，集合會為每個項目提供預設值。Note that the collection provides default values for each items. 也請注意， 類別會轉換已知索引鍵的同義資料表，使其與已知的名稱一致。Also note that the class converts synonyms for the well-known keys so that they are consistent with the well-known names. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 連接字串內無效的索引鍵名稱。

span.span: Invalid key name within the connection string.

exception.span: 連接字串中的無效值 (特別當必須是布林值或數值，但未提供這些值時)。

span.span: Invalid value within the connection string (specifically, when a Boolean or numeric value was expected but not supplied).
Building Connection Strings

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 清除 執行個體的內容。

span.span: Clears the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從 移除所有的索引鍵/值組，並重設所有對應的屬性。The method removes all key/value pairs from the , and resets all corresponding properties. 這包括重設為空字串的連接字串。This includes resetting the connection string to an empty string. ## Examples 下列範例示範呼叫的效果方法。The following example demonstrates the effect of calling the method. 此範例會以某些索引鍵/值組填入 ，然後呼叫 方法並顯示結果。This example populates the with some key/value pairs, and then calls the method and shows the results. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為 包含固定大小的索引鍵/值組集合，所以 方法只會判斷特定的索引鍵名稱是否有效。Because the contains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, the method determines only if a particular key name is valid. ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，設定的某些屬性，並嘗試判斷呼叫是否各種金鑰存在於物件方法。The following example creates an instance, sets some of its properties, and then tries to determine whether various keys exist within the object by calling the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataSource : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要連接之 Oracle 資料來源的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the Oracle data source to connect to.

value.span: 屬性的值，或如未提供任何值，則為 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至連接字串內的 「 資料來源 」 和 「 伺服器 」 索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Data Source" and "Server" keys within the connection string. 不論這些值其中已提供內提供的連接字串，連接字串建立的會使用已知的"Data Source"索引鍵。Regardless of which of these values has been supplied within the supplied connection string, the connection string created by the will use the well-known "Data Source" key. 如果當您嘗試設定此屬性時，傳入的值為 null，則會重設 屬性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未設定值，而開發人員嘗試擷取屬性，則傳回值是。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is . ## Examples 下列範例示範類別會將"Data Source"連接字串索引鍵的同義資料表轉換成已知的索引鍵。The following example demonstrates that the class converts synonyms for the "Data Source" connection string key into the well-known key. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: property bool IntegratedSecurity { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IntegratedSecurity : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指示是否在連接中指定「使用者 ID」和「密碼」( 時) 或目前 Windows 帳戶認證是否用於驗證 ( 時)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether "User ID" and "Password" are specified in the connection (when ) or whether the current Windows account credentials are used for authentication (when ).

value.span: 屬性的值，如果未提供任何值，則為 。

span.span: The value of the property, or a if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至連接字串內的 「 整合式安全性 」 索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Integrated Security" key within the connection string. ## Examples 下列範例會轉換現有的連接字串，將其從使用 Windows 驗證轉換成使用整合式安全性。The following example converts an existing connection string from using Windows Authentication to using integrated security. 此範例運作的方式是從連接字串中移除使用者名稱和密碼，然後設定 物件的 屬性。The example works by removing the user name and password from the connection string, and then setting the property of the object. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為 包含固定大小的字典，所以嘗試加入不存在於字典中的索引鍵會擲回 。Because the contains a fixed-size dictionary, trying to add a key that does not exist within the dictionary throws a . 下表將列出每個連接字串，以及預設值內所有可能的索引鍵。The following table lists all the possible keys within the connection string, and the default value for each. |KeyKey|屬性Property|預設值Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------------| |資料來源 （或伺服器）Data Source (or server)||空字串Empty string| |保存安全性資訊 （或 persistsecurityinfo）Persist Security Info (or persistsecurityinfo)||FalseFalse| |Integrated SecurityIntegrated Security||FalseFalse| |使用者識別碼 （或使用者或 uid）User ID (or user or uid)||空字串Empty string| |密碼Password||空字串Empty string| |EnlistEnlist||TrueTrue| |PoolingPooling||TrueTrue| |Min Pool SizeMin Pool Size||00| |Max Pool SizeMax Pool Size||100100| |省略 Oracle 連接名稱Omit Oracle Connection Name||FalseFalse| |UnicodeUnicode||FalseFalse| |負載平衡的逾時 （或連接的存留期）Load Balance Timeout (or connection lifetime)||00| ## Examples 主控台應用程式中的下列程式碼會建立新的 ，並使用 屬性將索引鍵/值組加入其連接字串。The following code, in a console application, creates a new and adds key/value pairs to its connection string, using the property. summary.span: 取得或設定旗號，以啟用在先前版本 Oracle (8.1.7.4.1 之前) 中的交易復原。

span.span: Gets or sets the flag that enables transaction rollbacks on earlier versions of Oracle (prior to 8.1.7.4.1).

value.span: 如果啟用交易復原，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if transaction rollbacks are enabled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`true`，這個屬性可防止某些錯誤時嘗試將交易復原先前版本 Oracle (8.1.7.4.1 之前) 中所發生。When set to `true`, this property prevents certain errors from occurring when attempting to roll back transactions in earlier versions of Oracle (prior to 8.1.7.4.1).

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指出連接開啟或曾經處於開啟狀態時，是否將敏感的安全性資訊 (如密碼) 當做連接的一部分傳回。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if security-sensitive information, such as the password, is not returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至連接字串內的 "Persist Security Info" 和 "persistsecurityinfo" 索引鍵。This property corresponds to the "Persist Security Info" and "persistsecurityinfo" keys within the connection string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Remove(string keyword) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Remove (keyword As String) As Boolean

param.name: keyword
param.span: 要從這個 的連接字串中移除之索引鍵/值組的索引鍵。

span.span: The key of the key/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this .

summary.span: 從 執行個體移除具有指定之索引鍵的項目。

span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the instance.

returns.span: 如果連接字串之內有索引鍵而且已經移除，則為 ，如果沒有索引鍵，則為 。

span.span: if the key existed within the connection string and was removed, if the key did not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為方法會傳回值，指出它的成功，您不需要查看是否有索引鍵，然後再嘗試移除索引鍵/值組，從執行個體。Because the method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not necessary to look for the existence of a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the instance. 因為會維護固定大小的索引鍵/值組集合，呼叫方法只會重設索引鍵/值組的值設回預設值。Because the maintains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, calling the method just resets the value of the key/value pair back to its default value. 因為 支援的索引鍵集合是固定的，所以集合中的每一個項目都有已知的預設值。Because the collection of keys supported by the is fixed, every item within the collection has a known default value. 下表列出每一個索引鍵和值第一次初始化之後或已呼叫方法：The following table lists the keys, and the value for each when the is first initialized, or after the method has been called: |KeyKey|預設值Default value| |---------|-------------------| |資料來源Data Source|空字串Empty string| |Persist Security InfoPersist Security Info|FalseFalse| |Integrated SecurityIntegrated Security|FalseFalse| |User IDUser ID|空字串Empty string| |密碼Password|空字串Empty string| |EnlistEnlist|TrueTrue| |PoolingPooling|TrueTrue| |Min Pool SizeMin Pool Size|00| |Max Pool SizeMax Pool Size|100100| |UnicodeUnicode|FalseFalse| |Load Balance TimeoutLoad Balance Timeout|00| |省略 Oracle 連接名稱Omit Oracle Connection Name|FalseFalse| ## Examples 下列範例會轉換現有的連接字串，將其從使用 Windows 驗證轉換成使用整合式安全性。The following example converts an existing connection string from using Windows Authentication to using integrated security. 此範例運作的方式是從連接字串中移除使用者名稱和密碼，然後設定 物件的 屬性。The example works by removing the user name and password from the connection string, and then setting the property of the object. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例包含了密碼，可示範 如何搭配連接字串使用。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 我們建議在您的應用程式中使用 Windows 驗證。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果您必須使用密碼，請勿在您的應用程式中包含硬式編碼的密碼。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Remove/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Remove/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 是 null (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: is null ( in Visual Basic).

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool TryGetValue (string keyword, out object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool TryGetValue(string keyword, [out] object& value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function TryGetValue (keyword As String, ByRef value As Object) As Boolean
public: override bool TryGetValue(System::String ^ keyword, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % value);

param.name: keyword
param.span: 要擷取之項目的索引鍵。

span.span: The key of the item to retrieve.
The value corresponding to .

summary.span: 從這個 擷取對應到所提供之索引鍵的值。

span.span: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this .

returns.span: 如果在連接字串中找到 ，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if was found within the connection string; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓開發人員安全地擷取值，以從而不需確認提供的索引鍵名稱是有效的索引鍵名稱。The method lets developers safely retrieve a value from an without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name. 因為依正常程序會處理搜尋不存在的索引鍵，則不需要查看是否有索引鍵，然後再擷取其值。Because gracefully handles searching for a non-existent key, there is no need to look for the existence of a key before retrieving its value. 呼叫具有不存在的索引鍵會將 null 值 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 中`value`參數。Calling with a nonexistent key will place the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例示範的行為方法。The following example demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Values As ICollection
public: virtual property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Values { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含 中之值的 。

span.span: Gets an that contains the values in the .
An that contains the values in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然 中值的順序並未指定，但此順序會與 屬性傳回之 中關聯索引鍵的順序相同。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the returned by the property. 因為每一個 執行個體一定會包含相同的固定索引鍵集合，所以 屬性會依照與索引鍵相同的順序，傳回對應至此固定索引鍵集合的值。Because each instance of the always contains the same fixed set of keys, the property always returns the values corresponding to the fixed set of keys, in the same order as the keys. ## Examples 下列範例會先建立新的 ，然後逐一查看此物件內的所有值。The following example first creates a new , and then iterates through all the values within the object. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Values#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Values/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Values#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Values/VB/source.vb#1)]
